name: Garden Of The Mind (chantay)
description:
Explore the surreal  garden of the mind, discover the abstract and usual world around you,  watch your mental state bar it effects how you talk about the world, keep it up or drop it the mind is a roller -coaster. Meet mischievous creatures and find friends to guide you, careful what you eat and drink. 

P.s  This world may seem 2D but move the mouse or analog stick to discover the hidden truth.
